description: Let sigma_m (n) be result of applying sum-of-divisors function m times to n; call n (m,k)-perfect if sigma_m (n) = k*n; sequence gives the (2,12)-perfect numbers.
comments: See also the Cohen-te Reile links under A019276.No others < 5x10^11. - Jud McCranie, Feb 08 2012
references: Graeme L. Cohen and Herman J. J. te Riele, Iterating the sum-of-divisors function, Experimental Mathematics, 5 (1996), pp. 93-100.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from Jud McCranie, Nov 13 2001, a(9) Feb 01 2012, a(10)-a(13) on Feb 08 2012
